main event: Three bright lights, circular in shape, gave brief flashes of light as they moved across the sky in a straight line, at high speed, from east to west.
interesting points: The witnesses are described as a highly reliable source.
The objects were silent, giving off no sound.
Similar sightings of fast-moving lights were reported by unit personnel throughout the evening, which were confirmed as likely meteorite sightings.
The objects were estimated to be the size of a star.
The sightings occurred over the course of approximately 20 minutes, with the objects appearing about 10 minutes apart.
